title: i think we need camera customisation (or more control)
body:
does anyone else find that it can become difficult if your on the red side to land attacks because of lack of sight and i know some will say some to move the camera but what about changing it (or giving fellow summoners the chance to) so that it can look like your on blue and this could be something that you could change in the settings.

discuss if its a good or bad idea or maybe even an imrovement that riot could place in another upcoming patch

replies.body: If anyone has played HotS the locked camera that you can have in that game where you can still sorta move it but when you take cursor away from  side it stays in the same place in relation to the champ, its really good and i would like to see something similar in LoL

> [{quoted}](name=PurpleNinja63,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WUOQhuFL,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-01-20T01:06:11.437+0000)
>
> If anyone has played HotS the locked camera that you can have in that game where you can still sorta move it but when you take cursor away from  side it stays in the same place in relation to the champ, its really good and i would like to see something similar in LoL

Its like, the one good thing about HotS. It would be cool in LoL.
I like it as it is, it gives more variability in the game

I really really want the option to bind a temp unlock, so the screen is only unlocked as long as you hold the key. I don't want a toggle.

But even a 'loose' camera mode would be cool, where the screen is basically unlocked but your champ can't leave the screen.

I find it really hard to play unlocked because nub.

The reason why I say this is a bad idea is because if you accidentally hit the key to change it in a team fight you're going to have a high chance at losing it not to mention how annoying it was when you could do it. (God bless backspace resetting it.) Besides that, it would increase the amount of CPU usage that league would take under certain assumptions of how they render the game. [This could be incorrect.] Thinking about it, it might be still on the PBE. 

I think it's good for youtubers and media people however not a good idea in practice. Reason: Graphic errors. 

With all said and done it's possible i'm completely off on everything and Red Side is master race.
